data.title: Isha Institute of Inner
data.meta_description: Visit the Isha Institute of Inner-sciences to relax, reflect, and reconnect with nature in a tranquil oasis nestled in Tennesseeâs spectacular Upper Cumberland.
data.text:
Shuttles

We encourage you to make your travel arrangements as soon as possible. There are many options of transportation services to get to the Isha Institute from nearby cities, and back again.

NASHVILLE, TN (2 hours away)

1)Â Isha Group Shuttles:Â For available shuttleÂ options, clickÂ here.

2)Â Uber App: $95 â $110 Total

Uber taxi service tends to be lower cost than a regular taxi. To book, you will need to download the Uber app on your smartphone with local service. Enter the Isha Institute address (951 Isha Lane, McMinnville, TN 37110) into the app to start your booking.

3)Â Car Rental:

Booking through Kayak.com tends to have low daily rates.

4)Â UCHRA: $11 Total for 1 passenger

UCHRA is a state-funded resource which charges $11 per person each way between Nashville Airport and iii. The service is available only on weekdays and you must book your shuttle at least 48 hours in advance (excluding weekends). Note: Shuttle makes multiple stops along the route to pick up/drop off passengers, so travel time is longer. Register by calling 931-473-6652 and asking for the Transportation Department. Please properly cancel your UCHRA shuttle if you decide not to use this tax-funded resource.

UCHRA Shuttle Timings:

Departs Nashville Airport 11 AM â Arrives at Isha by 2 PM

Departs Nashville Airport 4 PM â Arrives at Isha by 7:45 PM

Departs iii at 4:45 AM â Arrives at Nashville Airport by 9:30 AM

Departs iii at 9:45 AM â Arrives at Nashville Airport by 2:30 PM

CHATTANOOGA, TN (1 hour away)

1)Â Nooga Taxi now only runs between Chattanooga airport and our Isha center direct with no other additional stops.

It offers a 20% discount on the total price / coming or going from Isha center to Chattanooga airport. That is a straight shot trip with no additional stops. No additional passengers fees will be charged. On average each trip may be with a 20% discount around $98 each trip depending on whether they pay by cash or card(3% CCFEE).

Please mention "Isha" to avail the discount.

2)Â Uber App: approx. $60 Total

Uber taxi service tends to be lower cost than a regular taxi. To book, you will need to download the Uber app on your smartphone with local service. Enter the Isha Institute address (951 Isha Lane, McMinnville, TN 37110) into the app to start your booking.

3)Â Car Rental:

Booking through Kayak.com tends to have low daily rates.

ATLANTA, GA (3.5 hours away)

1)Â Groome TransportationÂ to Chattanooga: $45 Total for 1 passenger

Groome Transportation offers regular daily shuttles from Atlanta Airport to the Groome office in Chattanooga. Book by calling (800) 896-9928 , then see above for ways to get from Chattanooga to iii.

2)Â Car Rental:

Booking through Kayak.com tends to have low daily rates.Â 855-529-2501Â to book.

Visitor Hours 8:30 AM - 8:00 PM CT

8:30 AM - 8 PM:Â Adiyogi: The Abode of YogaÂ

11:50 AM:Â Guru Pooja (special offering)

6:00 PM - 7:00 PM: Aarthi (special offering) (Friday, Saturday, Sunday Only)

8:30 AM - 6:00 PM: Isha Life Shoppe OpenÂ

9:45 AM - 10:45 AM:Â Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya Practice CorrectionsÂ (Saturdays Only)

11:30 AM - 1:00 PM: Meals Available on Weekdays

11:30 AM - 3:00 PM: Meals Available on Weekends

12:15 - 1:00 PM: Aumkar Meditation (Ages 7+)

1:30 PM - 2:20 PM: Isha Kriya MeditationÂ (Ages 12+)

Â 2:45 PM - 3:45 PM: Living Isha Tour - Meet at Welcome Center (Saturdays and Sundays only, bring your own Vehicle)

4:00 PM - 4:30 PM: Yoga Namaskar (Ages 7+)

ADIYOGI: THE ABODE OF YOGA

The Abode of Yoga is a powerful energy source designed for anyone to enhance their wellbeing in all aspects of life. Simply sitting within the Abode allows one to reach an elevated state of consciousness and know yoga as an inner experience beyond mere knowledge, philosophy, or technique.

ISHA LIFE SHOPPE

Yoga gear, books, and handmade crafts available at Isha Life Shoppe.

AUMKAR MeditationÂ (Ages 7+)

Learn the timeless AUM meditation. When practiced daily, this simple meditation can strengthen oneâs physical and mental constitution and bring about tremendous balance and wellbeing.

ISHA KRIYA MeditationÂ (Ages 12+)

A simple and powerful meditation for clarity, health and joy.

YOGA NAMASKARÂ (Ages 7+)

A physical yoga practice that nurtures the physical, psychological and energy dimensions of a human being.

GURU POOJA

A special offering at Adiyogi: The Abode of Yoga

Guru Pooja is a certain science of using chants and offerings to manifest a powerful experience. This Pooja is offered to all the great masters, regardless of what culture or religion they belong to.

AARTI

Aarti - a special offering of fire at Adiyogi: The Abode of Yoga

SHAMBHAVI MAHAMUDRA KRIYAÂ - PRACTICE CORRECTIONS

This is a wonderful opportunity to get your Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya corrected and refined in-person at the Isha Institute of Inner-sciences! Please make sure you are on an empty stomach by 9:45 am.Â Please be seated 5 minutes ahead of time. In order to attend, you must have been initiated into Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya.

RSVP:Â https://prs.ishausa.org/iii/dayvisit

LIVING ISHA

Living Isha offers the possibility of residing in the sphere of a consecrated space, supported by an inclusive community. You can choose from individual homes, apartments, or studios, and craft your life within the grace of an exuberant, energized space. Join the tours on Saturdays

HIKES

Guided hikes available on Saturdays and Sundays at 1:30 PM. Meet in Welcome Center. Please note: Hiking trails are closed outsideÂ thisÂ time.

MEALS

Hearty vegetarian food prepared from scratch and inspired by cuisines from around the globe. Pre-purchase your meals here:Â https://prs.ishausa.org/iii/dayvisit

âThe Question Is Not About The Volume Of What You Do; The Willingness With Which You Breathe, And Walk And Live, That Makes You A Volunteer.â

-Sadhguru

Â There are many opportunities to contribute toÂ Isha Institute of Inner-sciences. Anyone can visit the Institute for their own personal, spiritual growth and participate in various volunteer activities including programs and events.

Volunteering at Isha Institute of Inner-sciences includes various activities ranging from meal preparation to gardening, and center maintenance activities. Volunteers also can offer their unique skills on projects to beautify or create special features for the campus.

To learn about volunteering opportunities at Isha Institute of Inner-sciences, USA clickÂ here. (age 18+)

To explore other volunteering opportunities, please fill theÂ volunteering interest form here. (age 18+)

The person who wants to volunteer is under age 18 --Â Click here.
